description:
Auslogics Disk Defrag will optimize and organize your hard disk files, defragment the file structure, and speed up applications and Windows.

Auslogics Disk Defrag will optimize and organize your hard disk files, defragment the file structure, and speed up applications and Windows. With the help of Disk Defrag your computer disk will work flawlessly fast and stable.

The program uses a number of algorithms that allow you to defragment your disk much faster than the standard utility, and thanks to a handy report, you will know exactly what was done.

Program features:
- Fast and reliable disk defragmentation
- Cluster and file system structure alignment
- Handy and functional disk map showing the defragmentation process in real-time.
- Simple and clear program management.
- Powerful report generator for comprehensive and easy-to-understand reports on the results of the program's operation.
- Minimum computer resource consumption.

Use Auslogics Disk Defrag at least once a week and your hard drive will always be in perfect shape.
